code_comment.enable_global_theme: Enable global theme with one line

quick_start.desc: Get started with MoinUI in just a few steps.

theme.title: Theme Configuration
theme.description: MoinUI provides a complete theming system supporting light, dark, and system-following modes.

root.title: Quick Start
root.desc: Use .moinThemeRoot() modifier at App entry to enable global theme support.
root.note: .moinThemeRoot() automatically sets preferredColorScheme, making the entire app (including system controls) follow theme changes.

token.title: Token System
token.desc: MoinUI uses a Token system to manage theme colors and styles, which can be customized.

api.theme_root: Apply global theme (use at App entry)

token.title: Token System
token.description: MoinUI adopts Ant Design's four-layer Token architecture for layered management and automatic derivation of design variables.
token.architecture_desc: The Token system has four layers: SeedToken → MapToken → Token → ComponentToken. Modifying seed values automatically cascades updates to all derived values.
token.seed_desc: SeedToken contains 18 core configurable values, the source of the entire Token system. Modifying these triggers full derivation chain recalculation.
token.map_desc: MapToken derives ~50+ intermediate values from SeedToken through algorithms, including color palettes, text opacity, size variants, etc.
token.derive_color_desc: Generate 10-level color palette using ColorPalette, mapped to Hover/Active/Bg/Border states
token.derive_text_desc: Opacity gradient: Primary(0.88) → Secondary(0.65) → Tertiary(0.45) → Quaternary(0.25)
token.derive_size_desc: SM = base - 2, LG = base + 2; controlHeight: SM = base × 0.75, LG = base × 1.25
token.component_desc: Each component has its own ComponentToken, inheriting defaults from global Token with independent override support.
token.regenerate_all: Regenerate all tokens (reset to derived values)
token.usage_view_desc: Get current Token values via @Environment for use in views.
token.usage_dynamic_desc: After modifying seed values, all components using Token will automatically respond to updates.

home.tagline: A modern macOS SwiftUI Component Library

feature.native_desc: Built with pure SwiftUI for optimal performance and native macOS experience.
feature.theme_desc: Flexible token-based theming system for complete visual customization.
feature.i18n_desc: Built-in i18n support with easy JSON-based translation management.
feature.a11y_desc: Full accessibility support following macOS guidelines.

intro.subtitle: A macOS SwiftUI Component Library
intro.description: Select a component from the sidebar to view its documentation and examples.

config.title: ConfigProvider
config.description: ConfigProvider is used for global configuration of MoinUI components theme, locale and other properties.
config.basic_desc: Configure ConfigProvider at your app entry.
config.locale_desc: Switch the display language of the component library.
config.theme_desc: Configure theme colors and style properties.
config.token_desc: Fine-grained control of component styles via Token.

i18n.title: Localization
i18n.description: MoinUI provides complete internationalization support with customizable translations.
i18n.basic_desc: Use tr() method to get translated text.
i18n.custom_demo: Use register() to add custom translations
i18n.json_desc: Load translations from JSON files with nested structure support.
i18n.json_demo: Use registerFromJSON() to load JSON translation files

playground.title: Playground
playground.desc: Adjust props to preview changes in real-time

api.component_token_desc: Below are the design tokens for the Button component. Override via ConfigProvider.
api.global_token_desc: Below are the global tokens used by Button. Configure via ConfigProvider.
